subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova defeated Nadia Petrova, 6-1, 4-6, 6-4, to advance to the quarterfinals of the United States Open for the first time since she won the event in 2006.
snippet: Maria Sharapova defeated Nadia Petrova, 6-1, 4-6, 6-4, to advance to the quarterfinals of the United States Open for the first time since she won the event in 2006.
